# Metahero contracts

[![NPM version][npm-image]][npm-url]

## HEROToken

* _Standard_ - [ERC20](https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/blob/master/EIPS/eip-20.md)
* _Name_ - `Metahero`
* _Symbol_ - `HERO`
* _Decimals_ - `18`
* _Emission_ - `10,000,000,000 tokens`
